currency.description: The currency this trustline applies to.

counterparty.description: The address of the account this trustline extends trust to.

limit.description: The maximum amount that the owner of the trustline can be owed through the trustline.

qualityIn.description: Incoming balances on this trustline are valued at this ratio.

qualityOut.description: Outgoing balances on this trustline are valued at this ratio.

ripplingDisabled.description: If true, payments cannot ripple through this trustline.

authorized.description: If true, authorize the counterparty to hold issuances from this account.

frozen.description: If true, the trustline is frozen, which means that funds can only be sent to the owner.
